tika-vin09t11:1: Dutiye idha bhājāpitāya laddhacīvaraṁ nissaggiyaṁ hoti, taṁ vinayakammaṁ katvāpi attanā na labbhati.
tika-vin09t11:2: Tatiye ‘‘samuṭṭhānādīni adinnādānasadisāni, idaṁ pana dukkhavedana’’nti pāṭho.
tika-vin09t11:3: Catutthe paṭhamaṁ viññattaṁ alabhitvā aññaṁ tato ūnatarampi labheyya, nissaggiyameva aṅgasampattito.
